about_the_game:
Half the citizens of Santo Ileso don’t know whether they’re coming or going, and neither will you with this marvellously multifaceted Cosmetic Pack celebrating the Weird Wild West! Don your hat, pull up your cowboy boots, and strap in to your custom Hollybird. Keep It Strange Santo!

This pack includes the following cosmetic items for customizing your Boss and vehicle:

• Double-fronted Hollybird car
• Four-sided Cowboy Hat
• Two-sided Cowboy Boots

content_descriptors.notes: Saints Row contatins frequent violence with blood effects and portrays the rise of a criminal gang in a realistic modern day America. Frequent cursing, crude humor and sexual innuendos are present throughout the dialogue. The character editor allows the player to be naked including censored genitalia and uncovered breasts.

detailed_description:
Half the citizens of Santo Ileso don’t know whether they’re coming or going, and neither will you with this marvellously multifaceted Cosmetic Pack celebrating the Weird Wild West! Don your hat, pull up your cowboy boots, and strap in to your custom Hollybird. Keep It Strange Santo!

This pack includes the following cosmetic items for customizing your Boss and vehicle:

short_description: Keep it Strange with this Cosmetic Pack celebrating the Weird Wild West; your enemies won't know if you're coming or going! This pack includes: • Double-fronted Hollybird car • Four-sided Cowboy Hat • Two-sided Cowboy Boots
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
